participant_1.background:
I wake up early and listen to Ween to get my creative juices flowing.
my name is mary and i m from colorado.
I got my teaching license last year.
i like to sit on couch all day.
i hope to one day be happy with myself.

participant_2.background:
I spent my summer eating burritos and traveling the world.
I watch my husband leave for work before I go to the basketball court.
I once sang "Hallelujah" at the top of my lungs to the police officer who pulled me over.
i m often late for class.
i wish i made more money.

content.text: I'm Mary and I'm from Colorado! What's your name?
My name is Mary too! I'm from California.
Wow that's funny! My name is actually Mary, but I go by MaryJane. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to travel and eat burritos! I spent my entire summer eating burritos and traveling the world.
That sounds amazing! I love traveling too, but I never got to go abroad this summer. I spent most of my summer sitting on my couch watching Netflix.
I wish I could spend more time on the couch, but I have to go to work every day. I'm a teacher and I'm often late for class.
I'm a teacher too! I got my teaching license last year. I'm really happy with my job, but I wish I made more money.
Me too! I wish I made more money so I could travel more.
Maybe we should start a GoFundMe so we can travel the world together!
That would be amazing! We could eat burritos and go to basketball games all over the world.
